about.title: About Me
about.quote: The joy is in the making.
paragraph1: I am Eric Greuter, and since 1980 I have been capturing the world with an analog camera as an amateur photographer.
Not to hastily shoot dozens of images in quick succession, but to first look calmly, feel, and then press the shutter.
For that very reason, in 2022 I started a new hobby: painting and drawing.
Through this, I discovered not only more about color, light, and texture, but also that the act of creating itself brings me great joy.
paragraph2: Use the menu above to navigate to the photo or painting portfolios,
or leave me a message below.

contact.title: Get in Touch
paragraph2: Use the contact form below to reach out to me:

Painting 1.title: Lago Maggiore
description: An ode to the "Blauwe Reiter" painting group from the early 20th century.

Painting 2.title: Mudflat walkers
description: The rhythm of ebb and flow of the Wadden Sea

Painting 3.title: Sahara storm
description: The colors of a Sahara sandstorm.

Painting 4.title: Ballet girl
description: The elegance of a ballet dancer captured in pop-art colors.

Painting 5.title: Persistence of game
description: A nod to Dali's work "The Persistence of Memory"

Painting 6.title: To head or not to head
description: Oil and oil pastel on paper -
Anatomy of a slaughtered chicken as they are offered on the market in France.

Painting 7.title: Toulouse de Latrac - woman
description: Portret of a woman "After Henri de Toulouse-Lautrec's."

Painting 8.title: Autumn
description: The symbols and colors of autumn.

Painting 9.title: Eve
description: A Cobra interpretation of the classic biblical theme.

Painting 10.title: Multi dimensional view of church
description: The church viewed from multiple dimensions
it is not always what it seems
"inspired by the style of Lyonel Feininger (1871–1956)".

Painting 11.title: Candlelight
description: "in the style of Gerrit van Honthorst (1592–1656)."

Painting 16.title: Abstract Diptych
description: in different color palettes and with different strokes.

Painting 17.title: Normadian coast
description: The rugged beauty of the Normadian coastline.

Picture 2.title: Columbine
description: When nature creates a work of art,

Picture 3.title: The colors of Brittany
description: A palette where the soft grey-blue
of the Atlantic skies meets coastlines.

Picture 5.title: Choose Your Path
description: Sometimes it’s just about taking the right turn.

Picture 8.title: Unspoken
description: Finding and sharing words became a silent struggle

Picture 12.title: A village of contrasts.
description: while the cooling towers of the nuclear plant rise behind it,
A stark meeting of past and present

Picture 13.title: Broken Glass
description: The symbol of the end of an era

Picture 14.title: Orchestra of Life and Death
description: Is it a melody of hope,

thanks.title: Thank You for Your Message!
paragraph1: I will contact you as soon as possible.

about.title: Wie ben ik
paragraph1: Ik ben Eric Greuter en sinds 1980 fotografeer ik, als amateur met een analoge camera.
Niet zoals met een digitale camera tientallen beelden achter elkaar te schieten, maar eerst rustig kijken, voelen, en dan afdrukken.
Juist om die reden ben ik in 2022 begonnen met een nieuwe hobby: schilderen en tekenen.
Zo ontdekte ik niet alleen meer over kleur, licht en textuur, maar dat juist het maken van, mij veel plezier geeft.
paragraph2: Gebruik het  menu hierboven om naar de foto of schilderij portfolio's te navigeren,
of laat hieronder een bericht voor mij achter.

thanks.title: Bedankt voor je Bericht!
paragraph1: Ik neem zo snel mogelijk contact met je op.
